Press Material

Blackbox is hosting top startups from all over the world


What is Blackbox?

Blackbox is a Silicon Valley startup accelerator focused on helping non-US startups that strive to bring their products to the global market. Our programs guide highly selected startups from all around the globe through setting up US-based business operations, raising capital and recruiting US-based executives. Blackbox programs include: Blackbox Connect, Residence and Accelerator.

Blackbox Connect is a 2-weeks immersion program for startup founders who are based outside the US. Founders will come to Silicon Valley and live at the Blackbox Mansion for the two weeks, where they will have the opportunity to live and collaborate with like-minded entrepreneurs from all around the world and take part in an intense agenda of meetings and workshops with entrepreneurs, investors, experts and executives. More info on http://www.blackbox.vc/connect

Blackbox Residence is available exclusively for entrepreneurs for up to 3 weeks. Living in Blackbox provides a unique opportunity for visiting entrepreneurs to build relationships and share their vision with like-minded people. More info on http://www.blackbox.vc/mansion

Blackbox Accelerator is a program focused on accelerating startups growth for one year. Participants will join the global Blackbox community, stay at the Blackbox Mansion, get legal and administrative help to set up a US presence of their company, recruit and build global core startup team, and raise investment capital. More info on http://www.blackbox.vc/accelerate

More information about Blackbox can be found online at http://www.blackbox.vc/

Selected companies for the Summer 2013 Connect program

Download here the press packaging for Connect Summer 2013.

Avocarrot.com - a platform that enables brands to engage with consumers on mobile by rewarding them for their in-app activity with contextual promotions.

EgzoTech.pl - a company established to provide robotized rehabilitation solutions, including EgzoEMG, a device for people suffering from muscle atrophy.

Groopic.com - Have you ever noticed your group photos are always missing the photographer? With groopic, this won't happen again, even the photographer is in the photo!

Inprisltd.com - an invisible, ergonomic, intuitive and secure, touch screen virtual keyboard that everyone, including the visually impaired can easily use.

Instabug.io - a start up offering a solution for app feedback, iOS developers can trace bugs easily and effeciently in just 60 seconds!

Melusyn.com - a startup company providing professional software for organizing and managing production in entertainment industry offering a web and mobile platform.

MyDoorHandle.com - allows anyone with a web-enabled device to associate their physical location with a unique name (or 'handle').

TunaCode.com - delivers accelerated computing solutions using state-of-the-art Graphics Processing Units (GPUs), APUs and CPUs.
